text.tspan: Road mortality rate per 100,000: IHME vs. WHO data, 2015
Mortality rate from road injuries measured per 100,000 people from the IHME, Global Burden of Disease (GBD) vs.
World Health Organization (WHO) figures. Also shown is the line of parity (along which estimates are the same).
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease; World Bank – WDI
